resource.description: Resource schema for EC2 EIP association.

properties.name: AllocationId
properties.description: The allocation ID. This is required for EC2-VPC.

type.description: The allocation ID. This is required for EC2-VPC.

properties.name: EIP
properties.description: The Elastic IP address to associate with the instance.

type.description: The Elastic IP address to associate with the instance.

properties.name: NetworkInterfaceId
properties.description: The ID of the network interface.

type.description: The ID of the network interface.

properties.name: PrivateIpAddress
properties.description: The primary or secondary private IP address to associate with the Elastic IP address.

type.description: The primary or secondary private IP address to associate with the Elastic IP address.

attributes.description: Resource schema for EC2 EIP association.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: Composite ID of non-empty properties, to determine the identification.

type.description: Composite ID of non-empty properties, to determine the identification.
